Hubs Hubs - 1

Accelerate your drug discovery with in silico solutions.

Aganitha partners with global bio-pharma to accelerate research and development by developing in silico based bioinformatics solutions leveraging Data, Cloud, Analytics, DevOps, and AI/ML.

Short, hard hitting phrase.

Our solutions enable Biopharma and IT to efficiently tackle the complexity, scale and richness of modern R&D domains and platforms.

Data as an R&D Asset

Organize and enrich enterprise data in an easy-to-consume format for scientists helping them to increase research productivity and making strategic decisions faster.

High throughput automation

Provide quick insights by intertwining analytics and AI in conjunction with high throughput automation helping reduce cycle times and drive efficiencies

Contextualized in silico models

Enable a virtuous round-tripping cycle between in silico and in vitro experiments by developing custom-specific models blending the advances in biology, chemistry, and computing.

High concentration biological design

Characterize high concentration samples to maximize the efficiency of screening, and also, minimize the total amount of samples required for analysis with in silico models.

Quantum chemical descriptors

Predict low yielding reactions and enable accurate predictions of an activation energy with quantum chemical descriptors leveraging machine learning, helping to decrease avoidable experiment expenditure.

R&D platform tools in a box

Simplify setting up the in silico computing platform and artificial intelligence building blocks that complement the traditional lab based approaches across drug research and development activities

New AKM Report

Reference Solution Architecture

Why Aganitha?

Leverage our experience and strengths to build transformational solutions in Biopharma

Blend of skills

Design driven approach to building solutions for relevance, high performance, and extensibility in software programs for AI/ML, cloud infrastructure for resource intensive computing, and process components for DevOps.

Deep focus

Deeply focused and long-term invested in the Biopharma industry continually developing solutions, frameworks, proof-of-concepts, and building blocks across drug research & development value chain

Client Confidence

Making it easy for clients to engage us for different types of projects from custom to accelerator-led development services while ensuring that the client retains the Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) and Molecule licenses, if any.

Solutions Foundation

Design driven approach to building solutions for relevance, high performance, and extensibility in software programs for AI/ML, cloud infrastructure for resource intensive computing, and process components for DevOps.

Client Teams - Research + IT

Adept at working with leaders and practitioners in both research and IT divisions of Biopharma companies and ensuring the role and department specific objectives are met with technology, domain, and management approaches

Agile + Enterprise Grade

Hands-on leadership team who bring the required variety and blend of expertise, experience, and management nuances: start-up + enterprise mind-set, technology + domain skills, and small + large team incubation and scaling

Our Solutions
